headline: Citigroup (C): Revisiting Valuation as Shares Gain Momentum and Bullish Narratives Circulate
summary: Citigroup (NYSE:C) has been making waves in the market lately, prompting many investors to take a closer look at whether now is the right time to jump in. There was not a single headline event to set off the recent attention; the intrigue here is exactly that the stock's steady momentum has caught the eye of value hunters and long-term thinkers alike. With questions swirling about the bank's true worth, it's a good moment to step back and ask if the story is more complicated than it seems on...
